H0.text: A democracy is a society ruled by the people. What name is given to a society ruled by the wealthy. Oligarch

H1.text: A democracy is a society ruled by the people. What name is given to a society ruled by the wealthy. Aristocrat

H2.text: A democracy is a society ruled by the people. What name is given to a society ruled by the wealthy. Capitalist

H3.text: A democracy is a society ruled by the people. What name is given to a society ruled by the wealthy. Plutocrat

A4.text: A plutocracy is a society that is ruled or controlled by people of great wealth or income.

A5.text: The term plutocracy is a specific form of oligarchy where the ruling few are wealthy.

A6.text: In 2018, Paul Volcker, a former chair of the Federal Reserve, stated he also believed the U.S. to be developing into a plutocracy.
